nodes.name: auth.sentCode
nodes.description: Contains info about a sent verification code.

nodes.name: auth.authorization
nodes.description: Contains user authorization info.

nodes.name: auth.authorizationSignUpRequired
nodes.description: An account with this phone number doesn't exist on telegram: the user has to enter basic information and sign up

nodes.name: auth.exportedAuthorization
nodes.description: Data for copying of authorization between data centres.

nodes.name: auth.passwordRecovery
nodes.description: Recovery info of a 2FA password, only for accounts with a recovery email configured.

nodes.name: auth.codeTypeSms
nodes.description: Type of verification code that will be sent next if you call the resendCode method: SMS code

nodes.name: auth.codeTypeCall
nodes.description: Type of verification code that will be sent next if you call the resendCode method: SMS code

nodes.name: auth.codeTypeFlashCall
nodes.description: Type of verification code that will be sent next if you call the resendCode method: SMS code

nodes.name: auth.sentCodeTypeApp
nodes.description: The code was sent through the telegram app

nodes.name: auth.sentCodeTypeSms
nodes.description: The code was sent via SMS

nodes.name: auth.sentCodeTypeCall
nodes.description: The code will be sent via a phone call: a synthesized voice will tell the user which verification code to input.

nodes.name: auth.sentCodeTypeFlashCall
nodes.description: The code will be sent via a flash phone call, that will be closed immediately. The phone code will then be the phone number itself, just make sure that the phone number matches the specified pattern.

nodes.name: auth.loginToken
nodes.description: Login token (for QR code login)

nodes.name: auth.loginTokenMigrateTo
nodes.description: Repeat the query to the specified DC

nodes.name: auth.loginTokenSuccess
nodes.description: Login via token (QR code) succeded!

nodes.name: auth.SentCode
nodes.description: Contains info on a confirmation code message sent via SMS, phone call or Telegram.

nodes.name: auth.Authorization
nodes.description: Oject contains info on user authorization.

nodes.name: auth.ExportedAuthorization
nodes.description: Exported authorization

nodes.name: auth.PasswordRecovery
nodes.description: Recovery info of a 2FA password, only for accounts with a recovery email configured.

nodes.name: auth.CodeType
nodes.description: Type of verification code that will be sent next if you call the resendCode method

nodes.name: auth.SentCodeType
nodes.description: Type of the verification code that was sent

nodes.name: auth.LoginToken
nodes.description: Login token (for QR code login)
